description: Numbers n such that sum of reciprocals of digits is reciprocal of an integer.
comments: Intersection of A214958 and A052382: A214949(a(n))*A168046(a(n)) = 1. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Aug 02 2012
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1232 (complete sequence)
mathematica: Reap[Do[If[FreeQ[id = IntegerDigits[n], 0], If[IntegerQ[1/Total[1/id]], Sow[n]]], {n, 1, 10^4}]][[2, 1]] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Dec 15 2015 *)
prog: (Haskell)a037264 n = a037264_list !! (n-1)a037264_list = filter ((== 1) . a168046) $                      takeWhile (<= 999999999) a214958_list-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Aug 02 2012
author: _Naohiro Nomoto_
